title: A Homemade Together Christmas
description: A family decides their Christmas gifts to each other must be homemade rather than store bought.A family of adorable pigs decides that this year they will make their gifts to each other for Christmas rather than buy gifts. Each family member is excited to try. Momma makes breakfast, Dad makes a blanket, and sister Rosie sings a song. But the littlest pig struggles to come up with an idea. What can he make?
author: Maryann Cocca-Leffler
